name: Knight Online 3D Mesh File
summary: Learn about .N3PMESH files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: K2 Network developed the Knight Online video game from 2004 to 2012 but ceased operations in 2012. Mgame Corporation currently develops Knight Online.

instructions: N3PMESH files are not meant to be opened. Instead, the game references the files when loading meshes for objects.

N3PMeshConverter (developed by Stephen Meier) can convert N3PMESH files to the more widely-supported .OBJ format. Knight Online gamers may use this tool to modify N3PMESH files by converting them to OBJ files, altering them with a program, such as Blender (multiplatform), then converting them back to N3PMESH files with N3PMeshConverter.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
